task.name: v.buffer
task.description: Creates a buffer around vector features of given type.
task.keywords: vector, buffer, area, circle, geometry, line, grow, shrink

parameter.name: input
parameter.label: Name of input vector map
parameter.description: Or data source for direct OGR access

parameter.name: layer
parameter.label: Layer number or name ('-1' for all layers)
parameter.description: A single vector map can be connected to multiple database tables. This number determines which table to use. When used with direct OGR access this is the layer name.

parameter.name: where
parameter.label: WHERE conditions of SQL statement without 'where' keyword

parameter.name: distance
parameter.description: Buffer distance along major axis in map units

parameter.name: minordistance
parameter.description: Buffer distance along minor axis in map units

parameter.name: angle
parameter.description: Angle of major axis in degrees

parameter.name: column
parameter.description: Name of column to use for buffer distances

parameter.name: scale
parameter.description: Scaling factor for attribute column values

parameter.name: tolerance
parameter.description: Maximum distance between theoretical arc and polygon segments as multiple of buffer

flag.name: c
flag.description: Do not make caps at the ends of polylines

flag.name: overwrite
flag.description: Allow output files to overwrite existing files
